name: saveLangToUser
sql: UPDATE user_state SET locale = :locale WHERE user_id = :userId

name: saveRoleToUser
sql: UPDATE user_state SET role = :role WHERE user_id = :userId

name: createOrder
sql: INSERT INTO orders (chat_id, contact_number, current_page_code) VALUES (:chatId, :contactNumber, 'CONTACT_NUMBER')

name: saveFromCity
sql: UPDATE orders SET from_city = CASE WHEN :fromCity IN ('kokand','tashkent') THEN :fromCity ELSE from_city END, current_page_code = 'FROM_CITY' WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'CONTACT_NUMBER' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

name: saveToCity
sql: UPDATE orders SET to_city = CASE WHEN :toCity IN ('kokand','tashkent') THEN :toCity ELSE to_city END, current_page_code = 'TO_CITY' WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'FROM_CITY' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

name: saveLeavingDate
sql: UPDATE orders SET leaving_date = :leavingDate, current_page_code = 'LEAVING_DATE' WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'TO_CITY' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

name: saveSeatsCount
sql: UPDATE orders o SET passengers_count = v.variable_value, current_page_code = 'SEATS' FROM variables v WHERE v.message_id = :messageId AND o.id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'LEAVING_DATE' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

name: saveComment
sql: UPDATE orders SET comment = :comment, current_page_code = 'COMMENT' WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'SEATS' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

name: skipComment
sql: UPDATE orders SET current_page_code = 'COMMENT' WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'SEATS' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

name: orderDetails
sql: SELECT * FROM orders o WHERE o.chat_id = :chatId ORDER BY o.id DESC LIMIT 1

name: confirmOrder
sql: UPDATE orders SET current_page_code = 'CONFIRMED' WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'COMMENT' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

name: cancelOrder
sql: UPDATE orders SET current_page_code = 'CANCELLED' WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE chat_id = :chatId AND current_page_code = 'COMMENT' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)
